main.bio: My name is Mario Merino.  I am a Web Developer by trade and an ok Mechanic/Photographer in my free time.  I was one of the first hires at a successful startup and learned their stack quickly and efficiently. I’m passionate about technology - not a specific framework or language. In this line of work, it's about adaptation, and what works best for the project. I’m open to learning any stack if it works.
